title: 3DLNews: A Three-decade Dataset of US Local News Articles
abstract:
We present 3DLNews, a novel dataset with local news articles from the United
States spanning the period from 1996 to 2024. It contains almost 1 million URLs
(with HTML text) from over 14,000 local newspapers, TV, and radio stations
across all 50 states, and provides a broad snapshot of the US local news
landscape. The dataset was collected by scraping Google and Twitter search
results. We employed a multi-step filtering process to remove non-news article
links and enriched the dataset with metadata such as the names and
geo-coordinates of the source news media organizations, article publication
dates, etc. Furthermore, we demonstrated the utility of 3DLNews by outlining
four applications.
